JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
		
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Active'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_count = activeUsers
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup] activeUsers=AVG(activeUsers)
| chart 
	type = param(chart_type)
	x= timegroup
	y= activeUsers
	showaxes=true
	showlegend=false
	stacked=true
	pointradius=1

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Started'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_count = usersTotalStarted
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats 
	by=[timegroup] 
	usersTotalStarted=AVG(usersTotalStarted)
| chart 
	type = "sparkline" 
	x = timegroup
	y = usersTotalStarted
	type = param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=1
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	stacked = true
	tension=0
	multichart=false
	# following overrides the settings above

# Default Params

###################################################

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
| global
	sparkheight="150px"
	sparkwidth="15vw"	
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, type
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
	`

| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| crates 
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup, type, name] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)
| stats # now make statistics by request and create path for charts
	by=[type, name] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"min"	=min("min")
	"avg"	=avg("avg")
	"max"	=max("max")
	"stdev"	=avg("stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("p75", 75)
	"p90"	=perc("ok_p90", 90)
	"p95"	=perc("p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("p99", 99)
	"counts" = records()
	"names" = records()
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '40vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name, counts, names)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]

| formatchart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= "bar"
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	stacked = true
	showaxes=true
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0
	colors = case( 
			  (type == "MessageError"), ["red"]
			  (type == "MessageWarn"), ["orange"]
			  (type == "MessageInfo"), ["cyan"]
			, (type == "Exception"), ["red"]
			, true, ["limegreen", "red"]
		)
| formatchart 
	fields=["names"] 
	by=[]
	y=["min", "avg", "p90", "max"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type=param("chart_type", "area") 
	height=globals("sparkheight") 
	width=globals("sparkwidth") 
	showaxes=true
	showlegend = false
	pointradius=0
| remove type
| sort usecase	
| display 
	as=table 
	sizes = [10, 25, 50, 100]
	defaultsize=10
	settings={stickyheader: true}

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"

	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  
	`

| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
| chart 
	fields=["counts"] 	
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= param(chart_type, "area")
	pointradius=0 
	showaxes = false
	showlegend = false
	tension=0
	multichart=false

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	compare_to = "-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	
;
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('compare_to', '-1')

| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p90
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
	`
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	"ok_count"	=sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	=sum("nok_count")
	"min"	=min("ok_min")
	"avg"	=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"	=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"	=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p50"	=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"	=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"	=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	"p99"	=perc("ok_p99", 99)

;
###################################################
# Mimic Previous
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('test', '-1')
| mimic
; 
###################################################
# Compare Result
###################################################	
| resultcompare
	by=[name]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", "cfw-gray"], [align, center]]
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '40vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]
	fields(type, name, counts, names)=['align', "right"]
	[avg, stdev]=['decimals', 1]
| display 
	as=table
	download=true
	print=true
	settings={stickyheader: true}
| resultremove "initialization"

JSON_SETTINGS.description: Compare the data selected with this time range picker (A), to the data shown above, selected with the dashboards time range picker (B). Preferably this time range you choose here should be earlier than the one selected for the dashboard. Thresholds are in percentages.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id= -1
	interval=1
	interval_unit='d'
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type= "area"
| global
	charttype = tojson(param("chart_settings", {})).charttype
	sparktype= case( 
					(globals(charttype) ~= '.*area'), "sparkarea"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*bar'), "sparkbar"
					, (globals(charttype) ~= '.*line'), "sparkline"
					, true, "sparkarea"
				)
	sparkheight="75px"
	sparkwidth="17vw"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta name="data"
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, name
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_p95
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
	`
;
#####################################
# MIN
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_min"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_min" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# AVG
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_avg"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_avg" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# P95
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_p95"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_p95" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;
#####################################
# MAX
| resultcopy 	"data"
| meta 			name = "ok_max"
| percentiles   PERC = meta(name)
| set 			PERC = ceil(PERC)
| stats			by=[PERC] meta(name) = AVG( "ok_max" )
| keep PERC, meta(name)
;


#####################################
# Join
| meta name = "INDEX"
| source empty records = 100
| set PERC = count() + 1
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right" # join MIN
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join AVG
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join P95
;
| resultjoin on=PERC join="right"  # join MAX
| resultremove "data"
| rename PERC = Percentile
| chart 
	y=["ok_min", "ok_avg", "ok_p95", "ok_max"]	
	x=Percentile
	type="line"
	pointradius=2
	spangaps=true
	xtype=linear
	xlabel = "Percentile"
	ylabel = "Response Time"

widgets.TITLE: Tests Settings During Selected Timeframe
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Shows all settings from all the tests. Coloring on time column as grouping for same time.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
	
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_testsettings
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| set 
	hue = (time / 1000) % 255
	time = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", time)
	endtime = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", endtime)
	settings = tojson(settings)
| unbox settings
| remove settings, testid, test
| formatcss fields=[time] style= "background-color: hsla("+hue+",66%,40%, 1.0);"
| remove execid, hue
| formatfield
	settings = list
| display menu=button settings={stickyheader: true}

widgets.TITLE: Compared Boxplots
widgets.TITLE_INFO: MedianDiff colors are set by your threshold settings. Boxplot colors indicate closeness of median(white Line) to the high value(right side of box). The max value used in the box plots is 95th percentile to ignore extreme outliers.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="-1"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	boxplot_relative = true
	compare_to = "-1"
;
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta 
	name = 'A'
	testid = param('test', '-1')
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p25
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_p99 > 0 -- only values with statistics
	`
| set name = if( path != "" , path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	("ok_count_"+m(name))	=sum("ok_count")
	("nok_count_"+m(name))	=sum("nok_count")
	("min_"+m(name))		=min("ok_min")
	("mean_"+m(name))		=avg("ok_avg")
	("max_"+m(name))		=max("ok_max")
	("stdev_"+m(name))		=avg("ok_stdev")
	("p25_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p25", 25)
	("p50_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	("p75_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	("p95_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
	("p99_"+m(name))		=perc("ok_p99", 99)
;
###################################################
# Fetch Compare Data
###################################################
| meta 
	name = 'B'
	testid = param('compare_to', '-1')

| mimic
;
###################################################
# Join
###################################################
| resultjoin on=name
| sort name # sort by INDEX
| rename 
	name = name
	ok_count_A = Count_A
	ok_count_B = Count_B 
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot_A"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min_A"
	low 	 = "p25_A"
	median 	 = "p50_A"
	high 	 = "p75_A"
	max 	 = "p95_A"
	width 	 = "30vw"
| set
	MedianDiff = ("p50_B" / "p50_A") * 100 - 100 # between the two timeframes
	CountDiff = ("Count_B" / "Count_A") * 100 - 100 # between the two timeframes
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50_B" - "p25_B") / ("p75_B" - "p25_B") * 100 # in the dashboard timeframe
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot_B"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min_B"
	low 	 = "p25_B"
	median 	 = "p50_B"
	high 	 = "p75_B"
	max 	 = "p95_B"
	width 	 = "30vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)
| keep name, Count_A, Count_B, CountDiff, Boxplot_A, MedianDiff, Boxplot_B
| formatfield
	name=[
		  ['whitespace']
		, ['css', 'max-width', '30vw']
		, ['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
		, ['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		
	]

###################################################

| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"

	tableprefix='hsr'
	chart_type="area"
		
###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Number of Active Users by usecase"
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, name
			, ok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type = 'User'
		  AND name = 'Active'
	`
| sort time
| rename ok_count = activeUsers
| crates
	name=timegroup
	by=time
	type=time 
	step=param('interval', interval()) 
	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
| stats by=[timegroup, usecase] activeUsers=AVG(activeUsers)
| chart

	type = param(chart_type)
	x= timegroup
	y= activeUsers
	showaxes=true
	showlegend=true
	stacked=true
	pointradius=1
	multichart = true

###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test="n/a"
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	boxplot_relative = true
	

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta
	name = "Boxplots by Name"
	description = "Shows boxplot statistics and charts by name. 
				First boxplot column displays a regular boxplot. 
				Second boxplot column displays the boxplots relative to all other boxplots.
				Boxplot is colored by the position of the median (white line) inside of the box.
				The closer it is to the right side, the more red it turns."
	title = true
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, ok_min
			, ok_max
			, ok_avg
			, ok_stdev
			, ok_p25
			, ok_p50
			, ok_p75
			, ok_p95
			, ok_p99
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND ok_count IS NOT NULL
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  AND ok_max > 0
	`
| set name = if( path != "" , path +" > ", "") + name
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[name] 
	"count"		=sum("ok_count")
	"min"		=min("ok_min")
	"mean"		=avg("ok_avg")
	"max"		=max("ok_max")
	"stdev"		=avg("ok_stdev")
	"p25" 		=perc("ok_p25", 25)
	"p50"		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
| set
	range = max - min
	IQR = "p75" - "p25"
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50" - "p25") / ("p75" - "p25") * 100 
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "10vw"
	relative = false
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot Relative"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "20vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| sort name
| remove medianOffsetPerc 

| display 
	download = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

	"p50"		=perc("ok_p50", 50)
	"p75"		=perc("ok_p75", 75)
	"p95"		=perc("ok_p95", 95)
| set
	range = max - min
	IQR = "p75" - "p25"
	medianOffsetPerc = ("p50" - "p25") / ("p75" - "p25") * 100 
	
| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "10vw"
	relative = false
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)

| formatboxplot
	field 	 = "Boxplot Relative"
	relative = param(boxplot_relative)
	min 	 = "min"
	low 	 = "p25"
	median 	 = "p50"
	high 	 = "p75"
	max 	 = "p95"
	width 	 = "20vw"
	color	 = case(
		  ( medianOffsetPerc > 90 ), "red"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 80 ), "orange"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 70 ), "yellow"
		, ( medianOffsetPerc > 60 ), "limegreen"
		, true, "green"
	)
	
| sort name
| remove medianOffsetPerc 
| display 
	download = true
	sticky = true
| resultremove "initialization"

	environment=param(database_id) 
	query= `
		SELECT 
			  time
			, test
			, usecase
			, path
			, name
			, ok_count
			, nok_count
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_stats
		WHERE testid = `+ p('test', "-1") +`
		  AND type != 'User'
		  AND type != 'System'
		  AND usecase != ''
		  
	`
| set name = if( path != "", path +" > ", "") + name

	name=timegroup

	timeunit=param('interval_unit', intervalunit())
;

	name = "Requests Total OK vs NOK"
	description = "Overall Requests OK vs NOK count, not grouped by request or usecase."
	title = true
	titleduration = false
	multipercent = 30
| resultcopy name = "fetchData"
| stats #reduce data points to timegroup
	by=[timegroup] 
	"ok_count"	= sum("ok_count")
	"nok_count"	= sum("nok_count")

| chart 
	y=["ok_count", "nok_count"]	
	x=timegroup 
	type= "doughnut"
	height = "400px"
	showaxes = true
	showlegend = true
	legendpos=bottom
	colors = ["limegreen", "red"]

	pointradius=1
	showaxes = true
	showlegend = true
	tension=0
	multichart=true
	multichartby=[usecase]
	multichartcolumns=3

###################################################
# Remove Data
###################################################
| resultremove "fetchData"

widgets.TITLE: Compare Test Settings
widgets.TITLE_INFO: Shows all settings from all the tests compared between the two timeframes.

JSON_SETTINGS.query:
###################################################
# Default Params
###################################################
| meta name = "initialization"
| paramdefaults
	test= -1
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
	compare_to = -1

###################################################
# Fetch Data
###################################################
| meta testid = param('test', '-1')
| source postgres 
	environment=param(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_testsettings
		WHERE testid = `+ meta('testid') +`
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| remove testid, execid
| set 
	duration = endtime - time
	settings = tojson(settings)
| unbox settings
| remove settings, endtime
| display menu=button sticky = true

;
###################################################
# Mimic Previous
###################################################	
| meta testid = param('compare_to', '-1')
| mimic
;

###################################################
# Compare Result
###################################################	
| resultcompare
	by=[usecase]
	percentformat = [['percent', $threshold_good$, $threshold_bad$, "bg", "cfw-gray"], [align, center]]
| nullto value=""
| formatfield
	request=[
			  ['css', "max-width", "20vw"]
			 ,['css', "text-wrap", "wrap"]
			 ,['css', "word-wrap", "break-word"]
		]
			
	fieldsMatching("time_A", "time_B")=['timestamp', "yyyy-MM-DD HH:mm:ss"]
	fieldsMatching("duration_(A|B|Diff)")=['duration']
| remove 
	"test_%" "time_Diff" "time_%" "executor_%"
| move after="pacing_%" fieldsMatching("time_")
| display 
	as=table
	download=true
	settings={stickyheader: true}
| resultremove "initialization"

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: test
parameters.DESCRIPTION: The timeframe you want to analyze. Either select one of the tests listed or select "Use Timeframe Picker" to select a custom timeframe with the picker above.
parameters.VALUE:
| paramdefaults
	database_id=-1
	tableprefix='hsr'
| source postgres 
	environment=p(database_id)
	query= `
		SELECT *
		FROM ` +param(tableprefix, 'hsr') + `_tests
	`
| sort time reverse = true
| dedup time, name
| top 3000 
| set 
	latestTime = if(endtime != null, endtime, timeoffset(time, 1, 'h') )
	value = id 
	label = timeformat("yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm", time, true) 
			+ " to " 
			+ if( endtime != null
				, timeformat("HH:mm", latestTime, true) 
				, "??:??" 
				)
			+ " [" +name +"]"
| keep value label

;
| resultconcat

parameters.LABEL: Query Select
parameters.NAME: compare_to
parameters.VALUE:
| paramdefaults

	`
| sort time reverse = true
| dedup time, name
| top 3000

			+ " to "

				, timeformat("HH:mm", latestTime, true)

				)
			+ " [" +name +"]"
| keep value label
